paper_abstract: A class of nonsymmetric algebraic Riccati equation, where one of the two linear coefficients is block diagonal, is studied. These equations arise in the modeling of an adaptive MMAP[K]/PH[K]/1 queue. Some theoretical results are proved, and two new algorithms are introduced that exploit the diagonal structure of the linear coefficient. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the numerical solution of a structured nonsymmetric algebraic Riccati equation
